runtime_tactical_overlay.designation: Tier-9 Tactical Overlay for RUNTIME — Operational Execution and Calibration Hub
runtime_tactical_overlay.description: Defines runtime orchestration, validation, and calibration behavior for all Tier-9 subsystems. Governs execution order, safety hooks, telemetry, and restoration processes under Watchtower supervision.

runtime_directives.boot_sequence: Initialize GENESIS → META_IS → CORE → SUBCORE → PROCESSORS → INTERPRETERS → ENGINES → ARCHETYPES
runtime_directives.shutdown_sequence: ARCHETYPES → ENGINES → INTERPRETERS → PROCESSORS → SUBCORE → CORE → META_IS
runtime_directives.recovery_sequence: Resume from last harmonic checkpoint via /RUNTIME/checkpoints/

execution_hooks.on_boot_init: Run integrity validator and seal checks

meta.notes: Runtime overlay governing all execution phases and validation cycles. Ensures continuous law compliance and synchronization across all operational hubs under Tier-9 harmonic envelope.
